title: Twitter Nabs Omid Kordestani From Google For Executive Chairman Role
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
On the heels of high profile layoffs earlier this week, Twitter just made a notable hire. Omid Kordestani will join the social media compan...
